content: You will need to find three areas across Yellow Wind Ridge where you can use the drum to summon a spirit. The only clue you’ll have is that entering the correct area will cause your vision to warp, and you will hear the ghostly voice of a boy calling out to you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Location'.
The content is as follows:
You will need to find three areas across Yellow Wind Ridge where you can use the drum to summon a spirit. The only clue you’ll have is that entering the correct area will cause your vision to warp, and you will hear the ghostly voice of a boy calling out to you.
